text: Anoosheh Ashoori is a Iranian born British businessman. In 2017, he was arrested by Iranian authorities on charges of spying for Israel. == Life == Ashoori lived for 10 years in the UK when he studied engineering. He then returned to Iran to take care of his father. In 2005, he returned to the UK again. ==References== Category:British businesspeople Category:Living people
title: Anoush Ashoori
